lyrics.stanza: Jesus the kingdom has come into us, Reigning and shining He's all glorious, Christ as the seed is the King who has come, Into our spirit His kingdom He's sown.
All of religion has missed it again, Teaching for doctrines the concepts of men; They vainly wait for the kingdom to be. A dispensation they're hoping to see.
But now the kingdom to us has been shown, It is no less than our Jesus alone. It is the Person of Christ in us all, And it begins as a seed when we call.
